description:
Designed for protection and performance in the harshest mountain environments, this is the flagship shell from the alpine obsessives at Arc'teryx. Built to exacting standards using extraordinarily durable N100p-X 3L GORE-TEX® Pro fabric, the Alpha SV is cut to fit over thermal layers while allowing dynamic climbing movements. A stiff-brimmed adjustable storm hood, urethane-coated external zippers and burly die-cut cuff adjusters make this thing an absolute fortress when conditions deteriorate, keeping you safe and comfortable while you work out your next move. Climbing-friendly features like underarm gussets and harness-friendly pockets make this the natural choice for alpinists, ice climbers, ski mountaineers and anyone looking for a totally reliable waterproof breathable shell.

  • Completely waterproof, breathable and durable GORE-TEX Pro construction
  • Face fabric is extraordinarily hard-wearing for maximum abrasion resistance
  • Micro seam allowance of 1.6mm reduces bulk and weight, as does extra narrow 8mm seam tape
  • Articulated construction facilitates dynamic moves in mountain environments
  • Underarm gussets keep jacket from lifting when you're swinging ice tools or reaching overhead
  • Adjustable StormHood™ is helmet-compatible, with a laminated brim to deflect rain and snow
  • Tall collar with laminated chin guard
  • Highly water-resistant WaterTight™ zippers used throughout
  • Pit zips for easy venting
  • Pleated chest crossover pockets offer extra volume when needed, and sit well above a climbing harness for easy access
  • Left bicep pocket safely stores a ski pass or ID
  • Internal zip pocket and dump pocket
  • Laminated, die-cut Velcro® cuff adjusters reduce bulk, and won't catch or tear off
  • Drop hem provides extensive coverage, with Cohaesive™ hem adjusters that prevent hem from slipping up above climbing harness
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
  • Regular fit is designed to accommodate multiple thermal layers
name: Arc'teryx Alpha SV Jacket - Men's
